type.description: What type to use for creating the bean. Can be one of: #class,#type,bean,groovy,joor,language,mvel,ognl. #class or #type then the bean is created via the fully qualified classname, such as #class:com.foo.MyBean The others are scripting languages that gives more power to create the bean with an inlined code in the script section, such as using groovy.

properties.description: Optional properties to set on the created local bean
